Merge pull request #3 from usc/master

Enhancements

Resolve ant compile errors

Unicode mark (BOM) is added in these files, some editors
(eg: editplus) try to be smart to add them. but it causes sun's
jvm 'illegal character \65279' compile errors, it is a wonder
that it will be ok to compile with eclipse.

Increase fluency when scroll/select page.

see: ViewPager.java -> setOffscreenPageLimit(int limit)
If you have a small number of pages (3-4)
that you can keep active all at once, less time will be spent in layout for
newly created view subtrees as the user pages back and forth.
